title: Bread Street Brasserie
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, British, European, Scottish, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Set inside the DoubleTree Hotels (formerly Point Hotel), this upmarket restaurant offers style and comfort with a variety of local produce and daily specials. Vegan choices are marked on the menu, and a regular vegan night takes place there. See website for calendar and times.
